|stockos = Linux;2.6.15;OpenWrt-deriv; |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J6 |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEAR |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR$ |default_ch = |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 02/02/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0027WQZXU |asin_country = |asin2 = B001UI4RTG |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9102; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976320605" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Netgear|Delta Networks}} The default SSID is simply '''NETGEAR'''. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=65560 On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = Same HW as [[D-Link DIR-615 rev C1]] Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
^ power jack
-------
® (3.3)
© (TxD)
© (RxD)
© (GND)
-------
